body: Love this, hate the series it comes from tho
I'm glad this isn't some rape fest for once.
Love this, the vanilla the girls deserve. More of this pls. = u =

Don't be fooled by the apparent sweetness of this for Kobanya is no stranger to Rape and NTR. This could easily be a long con, tricking you into the warm vanilla glow before it  ushers in a hailstorm to ruin your vanilla parade. The world Kuroinu takes place in truly was intriguing and it had a truly captivating cast of heroines its shame they really haven't thrived much outside the canon works, despite having a note worth fan base. Regardless of whether its sweet or deliciously bitter I'll say this much its nice to see Olga getting some doujin attention outside of canon rehashes.
I want to see a sequel where Chloe gets teleported there when Olga and the guy are mid way throw the coitus and then Chloe tries to kill the poor guy.
This is the pinnacle of hentai, from the gangrape fest, our dark skin queen is saved by this great vanilla
Bless you Koban for giving this bae some sweet vanilla
Pretty sure this is her only vanilla scene. seeing this makes me almost feel happy for her.
Yt for the vanilla tho. Love it!
Yess this is what I want thx kobanya koban
so she was saved from the orc rapefest and ended up in vanilla? lol
It's great because it contains kot babes form Kuroinu without fucking mothermuckers from Kuroinu so it's the Holy Grail of hentai. Loved it OVER 9000/10.
